games.description: Welcome to Tri Peaks Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! games.description: Count Escape Rush plays like a 3D stickman running arcade game. Different from traditional running arcade games, your members will run backward and shoot the chasing enemies. Any obstacles will decrease your members or make you lose directly. Don't forget to pass the green numbered walls and collect weapons to increase your firepower.

games.description: One shot golf simulator is the battle of golf rivals to become the golf king worldwide. Become part of this idle golf orbit rocket league in which balls go high to Mars. Smash the ball to mars and become the golf champions. Oneshot Golf Orbit is golf offline game which has many golf rocket leagues and one shot golf battles. Be part Mars golf games to become champions of golfing over it.
games.instructions: The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap your left mouse at the right time to set the power and hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance. Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

games.description: Welcome to the adrenaline-filled world of Parking Fury 3D, where you'll be at the wheel of various vehicles navigating the bustling streets of a massive city. Whether you're behind the wheel of a taxi or driving an ambulance through traffic to save lives, each mission presents its own challenges and rewards. For those who dare, there is the exciting world of car theft missions. Take on the role of a skilled driver tasked with procuring specific vehicles under the cover of darkness.
games.instructions: Arrow keys to drive and balance. Press CRTL to enter cars. Follow the arrows from the mini-map to the destination.

games.description: It's a game where you have to travel to the finish line without hitting any obstacles/ other cars. Other cars/obstacles move in sync with your movement and there are also additional twists to time mechanics.
games.instructions: Touch inputs/ WASD to move, E on some maps to change flow of time.

games.description: Do you remember your favorite childhood entertainment with paper and pencils? Then, immerse yourself in the exciting sea battles on your device's screen. The classic paper-based tabletop naval combat game is here! Enjoy exciting naval battles, strategy, and adrenaline.
games.instructions: In the Sea Battle Admiral game, you arrange your ships, guess the location of the enemy fleet, and shoot for the win! Strategically place your ships on the sea grid, invisible to the enemy. Your opponent will do the same, and then players take turns shooting and trying to hit the opponent's ships. When you hit a ship, a “hit” is declared, and you can shoot again. If you miss - the turn goes to your opponent. The game goal is to be the first to sink all the opponent's ships.

games.description: Your task is to create protective barriers by drawing illustrations on the screen that are able to repel enemy attacks. Each level provides you with new creative opportunities, your every stroke matters, and your artistic intuition will be the key to a successful defense!
games.instructions: Draw a bullet protection before the stickman gets shot! Caution! The bullet bounces off the surface and can fly straight into the stickman's face! But it can also bounce into the killer himself!

games.description: the emoji match includes dozens of different emojis. you can increase or decrease the number of pieces of these puzzles as you wish. so you can make it suitable for all ages. you can have a pleasant time by having fun and exercising your brain. come on we are waiting for you.

Survive the Entities: Avoid or outsmart various entities that lurk in the maze, each with unique behaviors and attack patterns. Find the Next Door: Continuously search for the next door to progress to subsequent levels of the maze. Collect Items: Gather keys to unlock doors, coins for upgrades, and useful tools to aid in your survival.

games.description: This is an Airway game. You have to create the path/airway to move the plane from left to right without colliding any blocks. When you complete the level then unlock the next level. You have 100 levels now. But I will add more levels every 100 downloads. Enjoy!

These improvements will help you gain an advantage over the enemy tank army.

games.description: Letters Match combines the best of the games you love. This is a mixture of matching games, word search and clearing the playing field. The correct combination includes not only pairs of identical letters, but also magic words; they can be looked up in a magic dictionary. - Letters can be selected vertically, horizontally and diagonally. - If you get stuck, use the hint. - Clear all cells of the field. - Earn points, level up and get rewards! - Discover all the “magic” words and play with those that bring you good luck!

games.description: Join Ruby, a schoolgirl battling a unique lung virus, in Funny Fever Hospital! Diagnose, operate, and dress her for the cosplay competition. Cure her, and she'll thank you with a dazzling dress-up session! Experience medical fun and fashion in one pet-tastic game!

games.instructions: Help two girlfriends create their own unusual version of the traditional Indian bride's outfit: apply wedding makeup; choose one of the festive hairstyles; complement the image of the bride with oriental jewelry. And, after all this pleasant fuss, welcome to the wedding photo shoot! The resulting fashionable images can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

games.description: Help Alex the Elf return the colors to the rainbow by jumping. Avoid enemies and find power ups to aid you in your quest.

On touchscreen devices like iPads, Chromebooks and mobile phones, you can use touch controls in the corner of screen, or tap directly on the game board. Also works with gamepad directional sticks if available.

But be on your guard, your enemies are not slumbering, and you can be detected at any moment.
games.instructions: Eliminate all enemies in the level by using bamboo thickets to do it undetected. PC controls: use the W/A/S/D buttons to control the character. Control on mobile device: tap the screen and use the joystick to control the character.

games.description: An incredibly cute game full of purring and cats. You have to connect identical cats to get bigger and bigger fuzzies. Each of them has its own story! Get to know them and connect the two biggest ones to win! Earn points and become the best cat on the leaderboard!

To get to know a cat and find out its history, click on its image in the bottom panel. Make sure that the cats do not reach the top line, otherwise the game will end! You can change the next cat for watching ads. Use yarn to remove the interfering cat, and remember - the main thing here is not to miss! Collect points to take a leading position in the player rankings.

games.description: Sword Run 3D is an easy to pick up action runner game. Collect sword pieces, cut off the obstacles that block your progress, and finally reach the finish line to win. Each level is a maze of challenging obstacles, security guards and rooms full of traps. The game becomes more challenging as you progress to higher levels.
games.instructions: Swipe mouse & finger. Unlike other dog games, there are no cats around to bother you, but you will find many power-ups and hiding spots, such as: -Hiding Spots: Take a break from the guards and hide in a closet, the perfect place to avoid detection until you're ready to continue your adventure. -Dog Treats: If you come across a cookie, eat it. They are delicious. -Buttons: Press buttons to eliminate electric traps or remove obstacles that prevent your dog from escaping.

games.description: Star Attack 3D is a thrilling arcade game that masterfully combines classic scrolling shooter gameplay with 3D graphics and modern mechanics. Take control of a powerful spaceship, engage in intense battles to destroy alien blocks, upgrade your ship with advanced features, and conquer a series of challenging levels. Whether you’re a fan of retro shooters or looking for a fresh arcade experience, Star Attack 3D offers endless action and excitement.
games.instructions: Controls: Use your finger, mouse, or keyboard to control your spaceship. Move it left or right to dodge obstacles and attack enemies. Attack: Your spaceship automatically fires at alien blocks. Focus on destroying blocks with lower numbers, as they require fewer shots. Upgrades: At each level, you can choose upgrades for your spaceship. Choose wisely to increase your chances of success in the upcoming levels.

games.description: Lead your stickman king to victory in Stickman Miners Wars, where strategic decision-making is key. Command an army of miners and warriors to build your forces and triumph over opponents. Upgrade your units and yourself as you gain experience, and strategically attack enemy castles while defending your own. Will your strategy lead you to dominance? Play Stickman Miners Wars now!
games.instructions: Сhoose the first region you want to reclaim on the global map and press the PLAY button. Enter the level to play as the Stickman King. To move, use the keyboard keys (arrow keys or WASD) or a joystick or mouse. Go to the miner purchase zone and buy a few miners. They will begin mining gold for you, and you can mine gold alongside them. Go to the warrior purchase zone to build your army. games.description: That's Not My Neighbor is a detective puzzle game. You are going to be the new janitor in this building when you are watching the tutorial video. Some monsters are not good at imitation and may develop flaws. You have no choice but to pay attention to the image of your neighbors. At the same time, remember to fill out checklists for each neighbor.

Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

games.description: Stickman went back to prison for committing a minor crime. It's time to find a successful way to escape from this cold, gray prison. games.description: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Mahjong Earth! This captivating game offers a tranquil escape with its soothing earth-themed soundtrack and stunning tile designs. When there are enough bricks, your base will be upgraded and the area will be expanded and the number of tower defenses will be increased. When the enemy enters the range of your tower defense, you will be attacked. On the contrary, when you enter the range of the enemy tower defense, you will also be attacked. whichever side is attacked and dies first will fail the game, otherwise it will succeed. Players who like brick-moving games come and download it.

games.instructions: Click on Piggy Once you have enough pennies collected, buy Items from the menu.

games.description: In the game "Bomb Head - Hot Potato" your goal is to stay alive and not die from the bomb in your hand. Drop bombs on your opponents to win! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of "Bomb Head - Hot Potato" and prove your survival skills and tactical thinking!
games.instructions: The goal of Bomb Head - Hot Potato is to stay alive and defeat your opponents by throwing bombs and avoiding their explosions.

basic_info.name: Clean House: Clearing trash and dirt

game_info.title: Clean House: Clearing trash and dirt

games.description: Welcome to an exciting game world where everyone can enjoy the process of cleaning. The further you advance, the more garbage accumulates, and your vacuum cleaner faces a real challenge. But don't despair! Collect all the garbage and take it to the garbage truck, earning money that can be spent on improving your vacuum cleaner. Clean and declutter your homes to restore them to their original beauty!
games.instructions: To pass the level, clear the entire room of debris. PC controls: Use the W\A\S\ D buttons to control your character. Mobile device controls: Tap the screen and use the joystick to control your character.

games.description: This is a brain-burning and challenging escape room online game. Interesting gameplay so you won't get bored. You need to open 100 doors to escape the room. Interact with objects and solve puzzles to complete the tasks in the escape game. Solve the puzzles, and take inventory of the hidden items. You may use them to open the room, move on to the next level, use your skills, and do whatever it takes to escape.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

basic_info.name: Northern Lights - the secret of the forest

game_info.title: Northern Lights - the secret of the forest

games.description: A new hit for fans of the Match 3 game genre! The Scientist Cat is already hiding items throughout the mysterious forest so you can enjoy finding things and earn as many emeralds as possible. The cat is happy to have new guests!
games.instructions: - Combine identical objects and get new achievements - Open up territories - Meet your favorite childhood characters in person - New adventures open every day

games.description: It is a fun, creative dress-up and hairstyling game for all ages. Players mix and match outfits, hairstyles, and accessories to create stylish looks. The game features cute characters, diverse clothing options, and a salon scene for designing unique hairstyles, colors, and headpieces. Enjoy endless fashion fun and creativity in a joyful, relaxed atmosphere.
games.instructions: Tap to choose and dress up.

games.description: Immerse in lush 2D golfing, each swing a masterpiece. Each swing transports you to breathtaking landscapes, with realistic physics and intuitive controls making every shot a work of art. Master skill and strategy across diverse courses for endless entertainment.
games.instructions: Master the perfect balance of power and precision across diverse courses.

games.description: Upon beginning to play, you will undoubtedly become hooked on these 2048 puzzle games. They are crafted with stunning visuals and user-friendly gameplay, making them an excellent option for enthusiasts of number block puzzle games.
games.instructions: Connect the tiles to double the number and continue as long as you can to get the highest number you get :) and enjoy the sounds you make by connecting each one.

games.description: A new exciting game "Spot&Differs" for children and adults! Find differences between two pictures and train your brain and mindfulness. If you like to play logic games, join us!
games.instructions: Open the game and start passing levels - find the differences between the pictures. In each level, you need to find 5 or more differences within the time limit. Comfortable game control: find the differences with touches (tap) on the phone or tablet screen, use the mouse on the computer. If you can't advance or find differences, use hints!

games.description: Guess Word is a free online puzzle and word game for boys played on PuzzleGame. It's easy to play. You have six chances to guess words. The letter you guessed will change color to give you a hint. This tests your vocabulary. The game is simple and very suitable for players of all ages. Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop are playable! We have three modes for you. Challenge yourself!
games.instructions: Mouse or tap to play

games.description: Solve the riddle of this fun game. In each of the many stages of Poopy Player Puzzle, the small player must use his or her wits to direct the doll to the right keys that will release it from captivity.The goal of the game is to rescue the small doll from Poppy's clutches to progress through the levels, you'll need to keep an eye on the things in the labyrinth; pressing certain buttons may speed up the game or remove hazards.
games.instructions: Play by dragging the player's hand to the key, then hit the corresponding button to unleash the level's traps. Navigate the labyrinth in the right way. Controls Use the mouse to play or touch the screen on touch devices.

games.description: Welcome to the world of high technology and business! In this exciting strategy game you will become the director of a thriving IT company. Your task is to find the best programmers, assemble a dream team and lead it to success!
games.instructions: The goal of the game is to develop and expand your IT company by managing its resources, hiring qualified employees, improving equipment and software, as well as attracting customers and earning profit. The player must strive for the growth and success of his company, achieving high results and becoming a leader in the technology industry.

games.description: Dive into Norse mythology in Thor’s Merge! Merge planets representing the Nine Realms to create even bigger worlds. Play solo to reach the highest score or battle others in PvP mode to climb the leaderboard and achieve ultimate glory in Asgard!
games.instructions: Computer: -Mouse: Drag the planet left or right and click to drop. -Keyboard: Use the left and right arrow keys to move the planet and the space bar to drop it. Mobile: Drag the planet left or right with your finger and release to drop it.

games.description: A puzzle game in which you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, it is important to use its mechanics to your advantage
games.instructions: 1. Connecting the lines will be easy at first, but as time goes by, the speed will increase. Once you connect a line, it will disappear and earn you points! If the playing field overflows and a piece is on a line and stays on it for a long time, you will lose and start the game over! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the game. Tap the screen to make the figure scroll or swipe down to make the figure fall. 3. enjoy the game, become the leader and top the list!

games.description: Simon and his friends have turned into superheroes and now they must look for the evil Professor Wolf and get their marbles back. Grrr… That boastful and braggart Professor Wolf and his minions don’t want to give the marbles back to Simon and they have challenged him to a super mega competition which he must win to get them back. If you beat him, he will be giving the marbles back to you. Surely you can win and get them all back. Go for it!
games.instructions: Help Simon, Gaspard, Lou and Ferdinand beat Professor Wolf in 3 amazing events which only a superhero can win… but be careful with the cheater Professor Wolf!

games.description: As you play, you'll find tangled screws, nuts, bolts, plates, rings, ropes, and more. Find out how to solve the riddle. It's not just a game, it's a journey through the many fun nuts and bolts of the game.
games.instructions: The goal of the game is to unscrew bolts and transfer them to empty cells! Unscrew all the bolts from the planks so that they fall down. Then you will pass the level.

Whether you're a basketball fan or just love fast-paced games, Basketball IO is perfect for you. With easy gameplay using either the keyboard's arrow keys or WASD or mouse click and drag, you can dribble, dodge, and score against opposing teams in offline games.

games.description: Challenge your skills as an engineer and architect in this puzzle game. Build the tallest, most stable skyscraper across 30 levels, from small houses to huge buildings.
games.instructions: In Skyscraper to the Sky, players build tall skyscrapers by connecting building floors. A single mistake can cause a collapse, adding excitement. The intuitive interface allows easy placement of floors and monitoring of stability. The goal is to build the tallest, most stable skyscraper across 30 levels, from small houses to huge buildings.

games.description: Unpuzzle master plan and execute your moves strategically to become the master, navigating through bottlenecks and utilizing “exit” strategies effectively. Touch the tile to move it in the direction of the tile. Complete each level that really challenges your brain to think sharper. Choose from a variety of themes and skins to customize your block-puzzle adventure. Each skin not only changes the visual aesthetic but also improves the way you interact with the puzzles, making every move count.
games.instructions: PC : Use the left mouse button to move block. Mobile : Touch a tile to move the block.

games.description: Train your brain and solve puzzles with cute cats! Drag and drop the cats onto the puzzle board and try to put them all together! Unique puzzle shapes and ever-changing challenges will train your brain to think in a whole new way. Can you fit all the cats in? Collect cute new cats as you beat each puzzle challenge.Now come and join the fun and challenging game world.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Welcome to Hexa Tile Master! Drag stacks of hex tiles from the bottom of your screen to empty spots on the board. Watch as similar tiles merge into bigger stacks, and collect stacks of 10 or more matching tiles to clear them. Your goal is to clear all the hex tiles before time runs out. Each level gets more challenging, but don't worry—fun animations and exciting rewards will keep you engaged. Enjoy the strategic fun and see how far you can go!
games.instructions: You can move stacks using touch or mouse.

games.description: Welcome to the wonderful country of Emerland! Dive deep into the world of magical tale where great mages battle for the Source of the ancient magic of the Cards! Explore mysterious lands accompanied by heroes that include a noble Knight, an Elven Archeress and a mystical Sorceress to defeat the malevolent Dark Master! Solve puzzles and collect combinations to complete difficult and varied levels! Get rewards and find new assistants!
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

games.description: In this puzzle game you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, use its mechanics to your advantage.
games.instructions: 1. Connecting the lines will be easy at first, but the speed will increase with time. As soon as you connect a line, it will disappear and you will get points! If the playing field fills up and the piece remains on the line, you will lose and you will have to start the game again! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse button to control the game. Tap the screen to make the piece scroll, or swipe down to make it fall. 3. Enjoy the puzzle, become the best and top the leaderboard!

games.description: Are you ready for a game of choices and surprises? Color Button is the game for you! You need to pick the right door and make it to the end safely. But be careful, each door can lead to a different challenge or enemy. You have to use your skills and strategies to avoid traps and obstacles. Teamwork is the key to success in this game. Color Button is an exciting game that tests your judgment and decision-making skills. Do you have what it takes to beat the enemies and reach the end?
games.instructions: Tap to play

games.description: Embark on a cosmic adventure with Fennec the Fox! Tap your way across the desert, unlocking upgrades that transform Fennec into a powerful cosmic traveler. Explore new worlds, face thrilling challenges, and evolve Fennec to reach the stars. Can you guide Fennec to the farthest reaches of the universe? Start clicking and discover the wonders that await!
games.instructions: Click on Fennec: Start by tapping on Fennec the Fox to earn points and progress through the game. Upgrade Fennec: Use your points to purchase upgrades that boost Fennec's abilities and speed up your progress. Evolve and Advance: As you level up, Fennec will evolve, unlocking new powers and moving from the desert to increasingly advanced environments. Reach the Universe: Your ultimate goal is to guide Fennec from the desert sands to the farthest reaches of space.

games.description: Hungry Snake.io is a classic game. Here you can try three game modes, Endless mode, Toilet Man, and Monster Brawl. Please note that there can be no collision between worms! In addition, our team takes user experience very seriously, we are always happy to improve the game so that every player can have a better gaming experience, if you encounter any difficulties during the game, please feel free to leave us a message!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: The player assumes the role of a driver in Zombie Arena 2 Fury Road, whose objective is to navigate a confined arena populated by zombies while using their vehicle as a weapon to overcome waves of the undead and unlock new levels. Also, there are modes where you have to beat the clock or fend off waves of zombies, respectively, and games where you have to live as long as possible.
games.instructions: In the main campaign, you'll have to complete a number of objectives where you have to do things like wipe out zombies from the battlefield and demolish regions that are filled with zombies.

games.description: Shape Transform Race is a fun racing game that can be played in reaction-based 1 and 2 player game modes. You can play the game against bots or against your friend. Always be the fastest by choosing the right vehicle for the terrain! You can unlock new vehicles and characters with the coins you earn from the races.
games.instructions: You can use "MOUSE" or touch controls to change vehicles. For 2 player mode, you can use "A,S,D" and "J,K,L" keys for shortcuts to change vehicles.

games.description: Power up your logic and spatial reasoning skills with Unblock It 3D! Rotate the cluster of bricks to find unblocked tiles you can slide away without hitting any obstructions. Play Classic Mode and enjoy hundreds of intricate puzzles with unlimited moves, new cube designs and backgrounds to unlock. Or, journey through time in Adventure Mode. Try your hand at 25 additional levels of increasing complexity and size. Explore Ancient Egypt, Medieval Europe, the Aztec Empire, feudal Japan, and more.
games.instructions: Clear the entire cluster of blocks by sliding them in an open direction. Each cube has an arrow on it. If it’s not blocked by other bricks, you can swipe it away. Tap and drag to spin the camera around the big cube. Search all sides and discover your next move. Watch out - the blocks come in different sizes! In adventure mode, you also have to keep an eye on the limited move count. Think strategically to avoid wasting moves on blocked tiles.

games.description: Magic Finger Puzzle 3D is an interesting casual puzzle online game. You have an amazing pair of hands that can fire the laser. It can help you smash the cages that are holding you. It can also launch boxes onto barricades so that you can escape from the cage without stepping on spikes and dying. But don't worry, you need to use your ingenuity to make good use of those amazing hands. All difficulties will be solved. Join the game if you want to try a journey full of adventure.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In "Caillou Chef," Caillou puts on his apron and takes on the role of a chef in a fun and challenging café. The goal of the game is to help Caillou prepare delicious coffees and pancakes for his customers, effectively managing time to keep everyone happy with the service.
games.instructions: Pancake Preparation: Place batter on the stove, watch the time to avoid burning, and add requested toppings (jam, cream, chocolate). Coffee Service: Serve coffee according to customer orders. Time Management: Manage multiple stoves and coffee makers as difficulty increases. Ensure quick service to keep customer satisfaction high.

games.description: Politon is a turn-based strategy game with easy-to-understand mechanics and satisfying visuals. If you want to test your strategical logic against enemies of different numbers and difficulty levels, Politon offers a variety of hex-based maps with various terrains. You'll need to manage your economy while expanding your territories and defend your region against rival invasions.
games.instructions: Point and click on tiles to select the region you want to manage. Then click on building cards to select which units you want to recruit. Expand your regions by moving units around and defeat your enemies.

games.description: Welcome to Doge Match, a delightful and addictive puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! With 36 meticulously crafted levels, Doge Match offers a unique and challenging experience for players of all ages.
games.instructions: Match Dogs: Swipe to connect dogs of the same color. The more dogs you connect in one move, the more points you earn. Reach the Target Score: Each level has a specific target score. You need to reach or exceed this score to pass the level. Earn Stars: Complete the level within the given time to earn 1, 2, or 3 stars. Aim to collect all three stars in every level for the ultimate challenge.

games.description: Math King is the perfect game to help your kids to improve their Math skills in easy & fun way! This game even helps you to develop calculation speed with high accuracy!

games.description: Collect and stack barrels, avoid obstacles, and make the highest barrel stack ever! Unlimited levels of stacking satisfaction!

games.description: The battle of the blocks begins in the block's arena with this great eating simulator game. Eat blocks around and grow your cube. Become the biggest block of the arena. Find various cube skins. Play single or 2 player! Cube players are all around the arena and they are eating blocks, cubes, and lower-scored players. Each block you eat will give you some points. Try to eat as many blocks as possible and try to eat low-scored players. Try to get to the top of the leaderboard.

games.description: Jump into the car and participate in this racing experience. Compete with other racers, participate in various challenges and time-limited events. Prepare your car and drift. Upgrade your carriage. The engine, tires and chassis improve the overall performance of your car.

games.description: Shadow Stickman Fight is an awesome and intense 2D ninja survival arcade game. You have to survive the endless waves of enemies with stickman ninjas. Every time you pass a belt exam, you get the examiner’s hat and weapon. You can use souls to trade items or earn gifts. You have to follow the white dots and hit the enemies. You have to time your attack when enemies are in your attack distance. You can also enter the arsenal and choose different equipment, like helmets and weapons.

games.description: Get ready for Bubble Shooter Pro 4, the ultimate bubble-popping adventure! The latest sequel introduces exciting new features: the explosive Bomb and Firebomb to pop multiple bubbles at once, Bonus Gifts, and collecting Stars to complete Missions. Customize your gameplay with new Props, Frames, and Hats. Dive into the action and enjoy hours of strategic bubble shooting with these thrilling updates!
games.instructions: Aim and shoot bubbles to match three or more of the same color and clear them from the board. Use the new Bomb and Firebomb for explosive pops. Collect Stars to complete Missions and earn Bonus Gifts. Customize your game with new Props, Frames, and Hats. The arrow at the bottom shows where your shot will go. Successfully popping groups keeps the board clear, but missing shots adds new rows, pushing bubbles closer to the bottom. Don't let them drop too low, or it's game over!

games.description: Gear up for Bridge Wars, a mobile gaming epic blending creativity and strategy. Immerse in a world where tactical mastery meets artistic flair. In the Parking Mode, you can park the car in extremely difficult environments. I hope you have enough confidence to challenge them and buy another 6 better cars.

games.description: Fill The Bottle is a puzzle online game for all ages. The design of the canisters is different at each level, which makes you think about how to get the ball in the limited space without crossing the line. Test your skill in maneuvering the balls and pass the levels with increasing difficulty.This fun and addictive game will keep you hooked as you come up with clever ways to place the balls and unlock all the levels!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Help Captain Barnacles, Peso and Kwazii to rescue Dashi in a thrilling adventure where you must drive the GUP-A ship in the Octonauts underwater world and reach the Whale Shark overcoming all the obstacles that you'll find in your way. Help Captain Barnacles complete all the levels of this amazing underwater Bubbles game

games.description: Embark on Banana Farm, an engaging business casual game catering to cat enthusiasts. As a diligent feline entrepreneur, oversee market operations and recruit adorable cat workers to enhance efficiency. Cultivate bananas and various products while serving charming cat customers eagerly queuing up. Ready to launch your supermarket?
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Phone Case DIY 5 is a popular Art Game. For children who like this series very much, you must be eager to play this game! In this new DIY phone case game, we changed the style of the game, changing the previous 2D style to the current 3D style. At the same time, we have also added patterns, decorations, stickers, etc. that can be selected. At the same time, we have also added an album function, you can save your masterpieces to the album, and you can view your own artworks at any time.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In the new action game CraftsMan 3D Gangster, which is exciting and similar to Minecraft, you may become a real-life gangster roaming the streets of the city. As you explore the open world, you'll encounter other criminals who are eager to wipe you off the map. Get through every level of this fun 3D action game, where you'll face more frightening adversaries.
games.instructions: Instructions: Try to survive all the enemies, run through the city looking for the objectives before they eliminate you, aim and shoot all the enemies in your path. Controls: Mouse To Look W A S D To Drive Space To Hand Break F To Exit Vehicle

games.description: Collect Honey Puzzle is a popular and favorite merge game. You are now in charge of collecting honey, but you need to slowly upgrade to collect it. You can start by collecting sticks and upgrading to bricks. Upgrade from one brick to three and then to the honey jar and finally collect the honey successfully. You can also challenge your highest record anytime, and anywhere. If you are interested in this game, join us!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Soccer dash is a soccer game in which you swipe a soccer ball through obstacles and soccer players and hit the ball to score a goal. You have drag controls, drag to choose the direction of the kick, and release to hit the ball. During the dragging process, the game goes into a slow motion state, so you can take your time to choose the direction of the kick.
games.instructions: The goal of the game is to bypass all the traps and score a goal. Management - swipe the ball. Change the direction of the kick and release to launch the ball.

games.description: Quest by Country - an engaging game that allows players to identify countries by their flags. This captivating task serves as an educational tool, expanding players' knowledge of the diversity of countries and the symbolism conveyed through their flags.
games.instructions: Choose to which country does the displayed flag belong. Answer all questions in the quest correctly.

games.description: A game in the genre of 2048. Skillfully use the game physics to your advantage. The goal of the game is to connect the jell to the maximum size and not to lose. There is a boosters in the game, which will make it fun and easier to pass the game.
games.instructions: 1. At the start it will be easy to connect the jell, but as time goes on it will get bigger and bigger. Once you connect a big jell, it will disappear and give you a huge amount of points! If the playing field overflows and the jell is on the line and stays on it for a while, you will lose, and the game will start again! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the jell. Release your finger or mouse button to make the jell fall on the field!

games.description: Welcome brave archer heroes to the enchanting realm of Idle Archer Tower Defense RPG! Embrace the role of a solitary archer, unyielding in defending their towering stronghold against relentless tides of monstrous adversaries. With an unwavering determination, you pledge to safeguard the realm from the nefarious creatures summoned by the sinister dark Lord. Engage in a battle to fortify your tower, enhance the skill set of your valiant archers, and triumph over malicious waves of malevolence.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Spot all the differences you can find in the pictures of these lively robots playing their instruments and do it fast! Try to find all the differences in each picture before the time runs out. Be careful though: Do not touch the screen randomly trying to catch all the differences this way! If you touch the screen 5 times without touching one of the differences is game over!
games.instructions: When you spot a difference between the images touch it or click on it

games.description: Embark on an exhilarating climbing adventure in "Hand Over Hand," the ultimate physics-based simulator game! Test your skills as you navigate through challenging levels filled with dynamic obstacles, strategic climbing mechanics, and thrilling ragdoll action. Race to the summit and grab the red flag, but beware of slippery surfaces and tricky terrain that will test your agility and determination.
games.instructions: Drag the left mouse button to move the character's. Please follow in-game tutorial to learn more. Use left mouse button to interact with in-game UI

games.description: Welcome to Figher Stick Hero Stickman, an exhilarating 2D stickman game that will test your dueling skills. Whether you're playing in an arcade or survival mode, get ready to engage in intense battles against your opponents. Choose from a variety of weapons, character colors, and character decorations to customize your stickman. Remember to attack while moving to gain an advantage and earn higher scores by defeating other stickmen.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: A fast-paced game where you will play a role of a robot hunter with a deadly dagger of light. With multiple enemies to kill, and a lot of challenging missions to complete, this game will take you on a captivating and thrilling adventure.
games.instructions: Tap or click on the screen to move the character. The aim is to sneak behind the enemy and neutralize it. Kill all the enemies to complete a level.

games.description: You’re at an abandoned gas station with really nothing else to do. Why not grab a couple rounds to kill time. In this immersive 3D game, your goal is simple: shoot as many bottles as you can. With limited time, precision, and speed are key to achieving the highest score. Tap or click to shoot the bottles. Shoot fast, shoot accurate to get the best score!
games.instructions: Shoot bottles in this fast-paced 3D game, aiming for the highest score with speed and accuracy.

games.description: Real Flight Simulator plays like an airplane driving simulation game with 3D models. In 6 levels, you can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for players to learn. The more expensive the airplane you drive, the better acceleration of it you can enjoy including the Power, Speed, Solution, and Brake. Good luck in the sky!

games.description: Dive into the atmosphere of escape with hide and seek in this free online 3d game! Help the hero to escape school! Hide and interact with objects to avoid being seen by the teachers. Get to the school bus by any means necessary to escape!

games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Welcome to BFFs Y2K Fashion, the exciting new fashion designer game that lets you explore the trend of the year 2000! From skater girl skirts to ripped jeans and t-shirts, or even the classic Y2K look with fun-colored low-waisted jeans and crop tops, you can customize your outfit and become an ultimate fashion designer. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Mustang City Driver offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.

For example, first design, then fly over your unique design using the flying mode! This wonderful simulation game may become addictive for you. games.description: Do you like match-3 games, candies, and delicious cakes? Solve sweet riddles, move puzzles, and collect culinary masterpieces! Train your brain by solving exciting puzzles! Rich graphics and pleasant music will help you relax to your advantage!

To do this, combine plates with different pieces so that they merge into one large candy. ★ The controls are simple. To move plates, hold down the left mouse button on a desktop or slide your finger across the screen on a mobile device. ★ Become a candy making master and take first place on the leaderboard!

games.description: Puzzle Box - Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock! Challenge your intelligence while enjoying casual games! Come and challenge Puzzle Box - Brain Fun to test your IQ and play with your brain! Start when you are ready and show your strength!

games.description: Get ready to have some fun with your neighbors! This game lets you be a bit nosy and test your neighbor's patience with playful pranks. Knock on their door, tap their window, ring their doorbell nonstop, turn their faucet on and off, or even shake their mailbox to see their funny reactions! Earn coins for each prank you pull off and use them to unlock a variety of new doorbells with unique sounds. You can also use those coins to buy hints for more reactions.
games.instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

games.description: Make sure those boxes are shipped FAST! Click on factory buttons to upgrade your productivity. Earn cash and reinvest to upgrade your factory production. Be sure to earn extra bonuses from balloons and drones. Follow the advice of the IT guy and engineer to crank those profits UP. Oh, and did we mention that your money is piling up as we speak? Go offline, return and claim profits.
games.instructions: GROW your factory, SHIP products and earn PROFITS

games.description: In the game "Tower Fall," you must navigate a complex tower, collecting coins to purchase various outfits and weapon upgrades, while battling enemy mobs to reach the final level.
games.instructions: Collect coins and jump down, avoid monsters, and reach the top!

games.description: Let's sort some hexa blocks on the hexa tiles. Hexa blocks consist of colorful pieces. Place the same colored pieces side by side and match them to stack all hexas over one tile. A great puzzle game begins with colorful hexa blocks! Sort the stacks side by side and try to destroy them making hexa towers. Match the same colors with each other. Exercise and improve your brain skills. More than 200 levels are waiting for you!
games.instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK to drag and drop hexa stacks. Use touch controls on your mobile device/tablet. Match the same colored hexa blocks and destroy them. Try to achieve the goal at each level.

games.description: Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes. In Level Mode, you need to arrive at the fire area and put it out in time in 10 levels. In City Mode, you have a chance to decide to accept the emergency missions on the street freely. In Free Mode, you can train your fireman knowledge without any limitations. In Parking Mode, you can forget about fire-rescue missions and train your parking skills. Enjoy your fireman time!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Fishing Life—a relaxing clicker game with 2D cartoon visuals. Choose your target fish, click the water to reel it in, and manage its energy. Prioritize upgrading Strength first. Skins enhance tap strength, outfits boost damage, and Keepnet nets extra prices. Assistants increase Income, Strength, Damage, and Price. Open chests and claim cash from charged drift bottles. Luck might grant you treasure chests—open them for valuable assistants!
games.instructions: Keep tapping on the screen

games.description: There are several coins on the 9 by 9 playing field. It is necessary to place the blocks on the playing field in such a way as to completely assemble a vertical or horizontal line. Gold coins can be used to reset unnecessary blocks and continue the game if you lose.
games.instructions: Three blocks appear on the left of the playing field, which must be placed on the playing field in order to assemble a horizontal or rotating line.

games.description: Features : - Offline game. - 3 Super Modes: classic mode, 3 player mode and Speed mode. - Auto arrange the cards - Game statistics. - Easy to play - Excellent and fair ai to play with. - Continue the last game from where you left. - No login required
games.instructions: Left mouse button

games.description: Now you must escape from Impostor Among Us and Rolling giant. But beware granny sometimes accidentally appear to haunt you! Grab all phone before time run out and call your friend to help you!
games.instructions: WASD - Move Mouse move - camera Space - Grab item Shift - run

games.description: Welcome to Fruit Candy Merge, where juicy fruits and sweet candies come together in a delightful merging puzzle! Combine matching candies to create delicious fruit combos and watch them burst with flavor. With addictive gameplay and colorful challenges, can you merge your way to fruity success?
games.instructions: Tap to drop fruit candies from above. Merge identical candies to create new combos and score points. Utilize the 'Remove Smallest Item' button to clear tiny fruit candy instances from the stage. Embark on an unstoppable fun travel!

games.description: Welcome to the game in which every new tide carries a new wave of style! Help two girlfriends to celebrate the new beach season with dignity. Each of the girls has her own unique sense of fashion and style. Combine swimsuits with a variety of accessories to create unique summer looks. And don't forget to pick up a surfboard or a sapboard. Get ready for adventures on the water and to become the most stylish on the whole coast!
games.instructions: In this dress up game you will meet two young heroines who are preparing for a vacation on the beach and need your help to create fashionable images for the beach. In the game, you can change images as many times as you want, creating new combinations and experimenting with fashion. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

games.description: With pixel art, paint cubes with the right colors and create pixel art. the right colors and cubes are waiting for you to paint
games.instructions: Use the mouse to click.

games.description: Huggy Wuggy Escape is a Poppy Playtime inspired fangame where you have to do 4 simple things in order to win: Find a gun, find some bullets, shoot down Huggy Wuggy and leave the factory before it explode. To kill Huggy you have to shoot him at least six times, but the bullets are rare, so you have to move around the complex looking for them. If Huggy catch you is game over. Once you shot him down, you have to reach the exit in less than 30 seconds.
games.instructions: WSEQ To move Up, down,left and right AD to Turn left and right Space or X to shoot

games.description: Beat off waves of snow monsters, connect cannons to get more and more improved cannon models. Monsters are strong and there are a lot of them, they constantly attack. Upgrade the base and guns, defeat them all!
games.instructions: Connect identical guns to get a more powerful cannon, destroyed monsters bring coins with which you can buy new guns. For coins, you can also improve the base by making it stronger and repairing damage You can also strengthen the guns by pumping each one to the maximum level. If you can't repel the wave, upgrade new guns and try again. The game saves all the data at the beginning of a new wave.

games.description: Last Day on Earth: Survival is a 2D survival simulation game. In this large ruined city, you have 51 locations to discover. When you collect some wood and metal, you can make weapons on the Workbench. When you win enough experience and level up, you can check your Attribute and upgrade HP, ATK, Speed, and Search. In the day, explore and go to places you have never visited. I hope you will survive 50 days and explore all 51 locations.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Embark on a merging frenzy with "Hexagon"! Place hexagonal tiles on the board, watch them merge and multiply. Create chain reactions and earn points as you strategically fill the hexagonal grid. Can you reach the ultimate merge and trigger the explosive power of 512? Play now and test your merging skills!
games.instructions: Place one or two tiles at a time and match with adjacent tiles to merge them together. Every merge earns points and merging 512 will clear extra board space.

games.description: Step into the boots of an elite counter-terrorism unit in Urban Assault Force, an intense first-person shooter that plunges you into the heart of urban warfare. The city is under siege by a ruthless terrorist group, and it's up to you and your team to strike back and save the day.
games.instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP and rescue - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

games.description: Drag to create a path and guide the car to the goal! You can only draw the line once, be careful not to break the car! To become a good bridge builder, you just need to drag with one finger to draw a bridge that is stable enough for the car to reach flags. You can draw a bridge on only one line, so make sure safety comes first.
games.instructions: Tap to play

games.description: The Granny Series continues with Granny 3: Return to the School. As Granny and Slendrina pursue you, you must discover the ammunition-filled pistol and all the keys to the classrooms of the deserted school. Entering the classroom, you'll find a solitary desk labeled "Granny" and the necessary keys to unlock the closed door.
games.instructions: The main objective of the game is to try to survive as long as you can by collecting items to hide and escape from Granny. Controls: WASD to move Right click to shoot F Interact Esc Menu

games.description: When you are running on a track full of various obstacles, you need to choose to go through the mutation gate to evolve your body, gain the talents of specific animals, and clear the obstacles in the road!

This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics! The squares don't stay in place, they pop up. The gameplay is much simpler. If you like 2048 games and want to play a novel mode, join the game.

In this Brain Puzzle: Tricky Choices game, use your imaginative brain to solve all the tricky brain puzzles, find the right storyline, and then pass the level. It may be easy to get through all the levels, all you need to do is make the right choices, sounds simple but it's not. Join the game and use your imagination and creativity to solve the puzzles!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Strawberry Shortcake has big dreams. She wants to be the BEST baker that Big Apple City has ever seen and that's why she packed her bags and went to live with her Aunt Praline to the only place where a baker can go if they want to become the best in the whole world: the BIG APPLE CITY!
games.instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

games.description: Bomb Evolution is a cannon-shooting arcade game. On the mysterious and mist-shrouded island, you have the opportunity to strategically establish not one, but three main bases, bolstered by an additional rocket. Engage in an enthralling battle against a formidable opponent, both of you operating under identical circumstances. Your ultimate objective: obliterating all the enemy's main bases positioned on the neighboring fog-laden island. May victory in this war be your prized accomplishment!

games.description: Solitaire Crime Stories is an exciting new Solitaire game which will carry you away into a world of fascinating criminal investigations, colorful characters and stunning locations. Test your skills by completing interesting levels and unraveling the mysteries of the town of Springdale! Springdale is a small American town that lives in peace and quiet... but that’s only at first glance. Everyone hides secrets here, secrets that could tear this carefree town apart.
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

games.description: Enjoy the delightful Donut Box, a casual HTML5 slide game featuring beautiful designs of various donuts and cupcakes. Each level presents a new arrangement of sweets for you to slide and match. With its engaging graphics and fun gameplay, Donut Box is perfect for players looking for a light and enjoyable gaming experience. Try Donut Box today and enjoy a sweet and engaging gaming experience!

You should notice the numbers and blank spaces on the box and slide the donuts and cupcakes to pass the level. As you progress, you'll collect coins by passing levels. Use these coins to change the background texture and personalize your game.

games.description: Welcome to Griddlers Deluxe! Immerse yourself in a world of captivating puzzles. Uncover hidden images by deciphering numerical clues on the grid. With almost 200 challenges, Griddlers Deluxe offers addictive brain-teasing fun. Ready to decode the mysteries? Play now!
games.instructions: Each row and column has hints that tell you the number of tiles that need to be filled in that row or column. Multiple numbers indicate multiple sets of tiles to be filled, with each set requiring at least one empty tile between them and another set.

games.instructions: Memorize the pattern and drag and drop the circles to recreate it in this thrilling memory game.

games.description: Hex Triple Match brings together puzzle challenges, strategic matching and merging experiences. This game consists of clever puzzle-solving and logical manoeuvres, making it ideal for those seeking a brain workout. You need to consider how to place them to eliminate them faster. Each colour represents an item, giving you a great gaming experience. Beautiful graphics bring you visual enjoyment. Come and join the merging game world.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Embark on an exciting journey of makeup, accessories, and fashion to help Ariel make an unforgettable comeback. With a wide selection of clothes, makeup, and accessories, help Ariel become the trendiest mermaid ever. Enjoy making her look dreamy and fabulous - The Trendy Mermaid is free to play for every girl.
games.instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

games.description: Welcome to the new game for girls who love juicy colors and stylish outfits. In this game you will meet two girlfriends: the self-confident Kaylee and the sweet Marie. The game begins in a world painted in bright colors, where girls want to create the most unusual and colorful outfits using the Tie-Dye technique. Join creative girlfriends and create the brightest and most stylish outfits in the world of Tie-Dye!
games.instructions: In this game you will become a real expert in the fashionable tai-dai technique. Show your imagination and creativity by choosing makeup, outfits and accessories for the young heroines of the game! The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

games.description: Welcome to Sigil Seeker!\nEmbark on a quest to collect mystical sigils by tapping tiles on the screen. Add tiles to your row, aiming to gather three identical sigils to collect them. Your goal is to gather all the sigils before time runs out. But beware, if your row overflows or the clock reaches zero, the game is over.\nAre you ready to become the ultimate Sigil Seeker? Dive in and start your adventure now!
games.instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

games.description: Welcome to the Live or Die pixel puzzle. The goal of the game is to escape the room. To do this, you need to get a key to open the door. When your player is alive he can move right, left, jump, take the keys and escape the room. If the player takes any damage, they turn into a ghostly form and can fly and pass through obstacles. However the ghost can't take keys or escape. To return to human form, the ghost must fly to the gravestone. Remember that you have only 3 lives. Can you escape the room?
games.instructions: Arrows to move, mouse/touch to interact with interface

games.description: Chaos Road: Combat Car Racing plays like a shoot-em-up car shooting arcade game. With 3D vehicles on the ground, your mission is to defeat the final boss by collecting upgrade items and shooting down vehicles on the ground. Your vehicle will keep shooting automatically. Don't forget to collect the magnet to collect all kinds of items easily. To defeat the final boss, you need to avoid its bullets and keep shooting. Have fun!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Do you like a cluttered space exactly where everything has its place? It is time to organize your life and become a tidying hero, conquering chaos one drawer at a time. Be sure to plan ahead for this epic puzzle or you may find yourself with a messier hand than when you started! Each brain training task will challenge you to place various items in the right places. You'll have to aim for perfect precision if you want to make sure the objects fit snugly and achieve the ultimate tidy victory.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

basic_info.name: Brain Find Can You Find It

game_info.title: Brain Find Can You Find It

games.description: Brain Find brings new brain puzzles! Combine brain power and discovery for a brain challenge like no other! You can use your brain and reverse thinking to get the final target item. The unexpected way of passing levels can bring you endless laughs. The game tests your logical thinking skills, reflexes as well as memory and creativity. Come and experience it and prove that you are the smartest!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Discover the exciting world of juicy fruits! The task is simple: connect identical fruits to create ever larger and tastier associations, heading towards the treasured watermelon. - Click on the field - Connect identical fruits - Create combinations to get bigger fruits. - Reach the last level - Don't let the container overfill - Earn money for new skins and try to pass with them ???
games.instructions: CLICK or TAP on your screen to throw an object

games.description: Microplastics Feeding is a game about a hungry fish who is looking for its favorite food: plastic! Help the fish to eat all the plastic things in the ocean!
games.instructions: Game controls: Touch click or press psacebar to change direction

games.description: Banana Bounce! ? is a side-scrolling game where you lead your banana to as far as you can. Discover many cool ? and amazing ? powerups to boost ? your progress! Discover unique ? characters and earn coins ? while you run! Don't forget to upgrade ⬆️ your powerups to make them even stronger ? and better! Made with ❤️ by Realinspirer
games.instructions: Use click/tap and drag to control the character. Use tap/click to control the UI.

games.description: You can test your pattern detection skills in this relaxed mahjong & connect puzzle game with summer theme. You can eliminate pair of same tiles. The line connecting the two clicked tiles can't have more than 2 corners. Some levels the tiles can auto slide( to left, to right, to up, to bottom). Can you clear the board before time runs out? Enjoying matching summer tiles with 30 puzzle stages in this game.
games.instructions: Use mouse to play this mahjong connect games with the summer theme.

games.description: Dive into the sunny and captivating world of Summer Spotlight Differences, a delightful spot-the-difference game that's perfect for all ages. This engaging game challenges you to find all 5 differences in each level to advance to the next, offering endless fun and a great way to sharpen your observational skills. Enjoy the challenge and have a blast with this fantastic spot-the-difference game!
games.instructions: Use mouse to play.

games.description: Supermarket Manager Simulator is a business game. Have you ever fantasized about running your supermarket in your childhood? Play as the store manager in this game and stock up on a variety of goods, from chips and fries to meats, burgers, vegetables, and fruits. From stocking, and shelving to selling, you will be the one to take care of it! Don't hesitate to start your entrepreneurial journey now and become a great store tycoon!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Stickman vs Zombies WorldCraft is an action and adventure platform game in which you can play as a brave stick ninja. As your stickman hero, your mission is to wipe all the craft zombies. Along the way, you'll find money that you may use to unlock cool new skins. Navigate the map in search of zombies before they track you down and rush you or open fire on you. Keep going, for the zombie craft will attempt to catch you if you leave even one alive.
games.instructions: Instructions: Search and eliminate all the craft zombies in each level to emerge alive and move on to another level. WASD to move and jump Spacebar and Click mouse to attack E Shield Use the game buttons for touch devices.

games.description: In Popping Pets, stack and match adorable pets to score points! Connect three or more adjacent pets to clear them before time runs out. Look out for bombs for big clears and big points. Can you reach the highest score in one minute?
games.instructions: Click pets that are connected with three or more of the same pets to pop them! Find as many matches as fast as possible to score big points! Unlock pet abilities with your earnings to change your strategy and possibly increase your high score!

games.description: The aim of this game that will help you become a muscle master, a boxer or an MMA fighter is to reach the best level! In this adventure where you start with a weak body, start exercising and reach a more muscular body by merging with the characters. As you progress, participate in fighting tournaments and grow faster with the rewards you earn!
games.instructions: - Select characters and combine them with others. - Level up as you score and join fights when the tournament is ready. - During fights, try to defeat the opponent by clicking on the screen quickly or using the spacebar on the computer.

games.description: JON & BLITZ - IT’S VELOCI-TIME! • Throwing the lasso to the escaped compies • Dodging herds of ankylosaurus. • Finding the naughty compies. • Feeding Angus. • Flying and dodging objects with Pteddy • Moving the dinosaurs to the stable. • Challenging the Trihorn Raptor to a race. • Helping the compies to jump across the river.
games.instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

games.description: Step into Riot Village, a thrilling browser-based adventure where your shooting skills and strategy are tested. Navigate 10 intense levels with AI enemies. Visit the market to choose from 6 unique weapons and equip up to 4 in your inventory. Switch weapons during gameplay to overcome challenges. The game features automatic character movement, letting you focus on aiming and shooting. Adapt your strategy as each enemy wields different weapons. Are you ready for the challenge?
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Collect cylinders, roll out the road and overcome obstacles in this unique game. It is suitable for all fans of arcade games who like to test their skills and reactions. Try all the features of the game, unlock new levels and beat your records! You only need a few minutes to fully immerse yourself in this exciting game. Try it yourself!
games.instructions: 1. Hold down the mouse button or finger on the screen and move left/right to control the stickman. 2. Collect as many cylinders as possible to make your way, avoid obstacles. 3. Get rewards and improve the characteristics of the stickman to play better.

games.description: Stunt Fury takes adrenaline-fueled stunts to new heights in this action-packed gaming experience. Strap in and prepare to defy gravity as you showcase your skills on a variety of daring platforms. With heart-pounding excitement around every corner, this game challenges players to push the limits of physics and creativity.
games.instructions: - Use arrow keys and WASD to Drive - Space to Hand Brake

games.description: Looking for a simple way to exercise your brain every day? Try Color Strings! This game features straightforward rules and fun, challenging gameplay. In this puzzle game, you need to rearrange the strings on the dots to match the given pattern. With various puzzle levels, you'll keep your brain sharp in just a few minutes each day.
games.instructions: In this puzzle game, you should reshape the strings on the dots to match the pattern shape. Each string on the puzzle board has a color, and you should use the same-colored string as the pattern. With each level progressing, the shape gets more complicated and challenging for your players.

games.description: Enter the adorable world of Cat Football, where cute felines don caps and engage in soccer madness! Score goals using a ball of blue thread against cardboard box goals. Compete with friends or challenge a skilled computer opponent in time-limited matches filled with frantic fun!
games.instructions: Control cute cats in caps, score goals with a ball of blue thread.

games.description: Immerse yourself in a fun-filled beach adventure where your goal is to aim and shoot the ball into the goal while collecting starfish for maximum points. With over 20 challenging levels, you'll need to think strategically to navigate obstacles like crabs and sandcastles. Enjoy a vibrant beach setting complete with golden sand, coconut trees, and a soothing soundtrack.
games.instructions: Aim, shoot, and collect starfish in a beach-themed puzzle adventure with over 20 challenging levels.

games.description: In Mermaidcore Makeup, you ladies can step into the shoes of a talented makeup artist and work your magic on three stunning ladies. Journey into the realm of fantasy as you help these beauties achieve their perfect, enchanting looks. Prepare for a sensational trip filled with endless options as you explore an extensive selection of hairstyles, eyeshadows, mascara, lipsticks, face patterns, and intricate shoulder and neck patterns that perfectly match each girl's unique style and personality.
games.instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

games.description: Gelatino needs your help! He needs to collect as much ice as he can! The hot summer sun will melt him if he doesn't pay attention! But the road isn't safe: it is full of evil hot suns that will melt Gelatino in no time! Destroy them will make you earn more points, but the price to pay to make a highscore could be to high...
games.instructions: Touch the screen to move the player left and right

games.description: Slope Emoji is a fantastic endless ball rolling game with many emoji balls. Guide a colorful cast of emoji characters down challenging slopes. Test your reflexes with endless series of obstacles, unexpected twists, and surprises. Collect Likes button for more new emoji characters with unique faces! Get ready for the ride of your life and master the art of ball rolling!
games.instructions: Steer the ball with A/D or Left/Right arrow keys. Get as far as you can and climb up the leaderboard. Avoid all obstacles, bombs, and try to stay on the platform. Falling off the platform or hitting any obstacle and the game is over.

games.description: A unique tile ball puzzle game from coin base bitcoin games loved by millions of players around the world. Make a lot of coins and become a rich. ? - Start with 10 and start making millions. ? - Coun you rech the topmillioners.❓ - Play with friend together.? - Guess the ball where it will go.?
games.instructions: It is that simple as going to school (lol). - On the right sight you will see a lot of buttons. ? - Just click on any one. ?

games.description: Embark on a brand new Dynamons adventure in Dynamons 8! This online monster collecting game includes two fresh areas to explore; Chinese Festival world and the bonus cave. Seasoned Dynamons connoisseur Jovani will tell you everything you need to know to become a true Dynamon Captain. Encounter Robocanyx, Jaxaguar, Sauryx, Dagaryx and Tydonyx and many more special Dynamons. Recruit them for your team and beat others in thrilling 1v1 battles with special attacks and power-ups.
games.instructions: Play the game using touchscreen controls or your mouse. The game consists of spellbinding turn-based battles. You can use the action cards to attack, and catch the opposing creature when it’s weakened. The backpack is filled with items you can collect and use during your journeys. By selecting it during battle, you can access these special items. Use shards to level up your Dynamons, and to gain new action cards. Challenge other trainers and become the strongest Dynamon Captain!

games.description: Raise your dragons at Solitaire! Clear the game by moving all cards to the foundation! Move cards from the tableau or stockpile in ascending order of the same suit. In the tableau, you can stack cards in descending order with alternating colors! You can place a King card in an empty column! When there are no available moves, you can draw cards from the stockpile to the foundation or tableau!
games.instructions: Tap or drag to move cards.

games.description: A completely new approach to the classic game 2048?! Now in 3D and with dynamic physics?! Number cubes don't just merge - they bounce and collide?, adding an element of surprise to every game! Compete with friends or colleagues?!
games.instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the cubes, but over time there will be more and more of them. Once you connect the biggest cube in this game, it will disappear. If one of the cubes touches the line, you lose and the game starts again. 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the cube. Release your finger or mouse button to let the cube fall onto the field!

games.description: Welcome to BFF Lovely Kawaii Outfits game. Princesses Elsa, Anna, Moana, and Jasmine are more fascinated about Kawaii Outfits. They are very eager to browse the new collection of Kawaii outfits. Start helping with each princess for their outfits and matching costumes by browsing their wardrobe. Play these cute girl games and have fun!
games.instructions: Left mouse button click

games.description: Nuts And Bolts Screw Puzzle is a puzzle game to remove bolts from the board, by moving the bolts to other bolt holes. The game will be finished when all the boards are gone This challenging and addictive Wooden Nuts & Bolts puzzle game will test your problem solving skills as you twist, turn and strategize your way through a maze of tricky Wooden tools. With each level, the puzzles become more complicated and complex.
games.instructions: Touch the bolt you selected, then move it to the available bolt hole, removing all boards from the game screen. When the board is stuck, it is your job to drop the board so that the game is finished.

games.description: Are you looking for a fresh twist on a familiar game? Cards 2048 is the perfect blend of classic solitaire and the popular 2048 puzzle game! This unique combination creates an engaging brain teaser that's highly addictive. As you merge cards with matching numbers, the challenge intensifies, offering a true test of your skill and strategy. Sharpen your logic and enjoy hours of fun with Cards 2048, the ultimate card merging game for puzzle enthusiasts!
games.instructions: In this puzzle game, you should drag the cards to an open slot on the board. When you put two same number cards in a column together, they will be merged. You should challenge yourself and reach 2048! If you can’t merge the numbers and you have no space left to drag the new cards, the game will be over.

games.description: In Boom Stick Bazooka, an explosive online game where you may customize your bazooka and smash platforms and opposing stickmen, you're in for a wild ride. The black stickmen are stationed in towers, and if you pause for even a second, they'll open fire, attempting to wipe off your three lives. In each level, you'll have three chances to aim and fire; you may always try again or purchase more ammo. If you want to kill foes quickly, blow up the barrels so they explode and knock down the towers.
games.instructions: Using just three bazooka rounds, you must destroy all adversaries in the game. You may use heavy items or adjacent barrel explosions to attack the stickmen and demolish the towers. Controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot Tap on the screen and drag to shoot.

games.description: Ready to challenge yourself? Chain Cubes 2048 is an addictive merging puzzle online game for those who like challenging brain teasers and logic puzzle merging games. Believe it or not, it's much harder to put together 2048 cubes than it is to throw away the numbers. If you fail to merge the cube number blocks, they will bounce off each other! Keep playing and eventually complete 2248 number puzzles!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Tiny Cars is a colorful arcade traffic management game where players must avoid collisions. With a top-down view and engaging gameplay, this game features 50 base stages set in various locations like crossroads, squares, and highways. After completing the initial 50 levels, players will encounter the same environments with increased difficulty, offering a challenging and addictive experience for traffic control enthusiasts. Enjoy managing the traffic and becoming a master of Tiny Cars, the ultimate arcade traffic management game!
games.instructions: Click on the cars to manage their movement. Keep an eye on all the cars to anticipate potential collisions. Some levels require precise timing and patience to complete successfully. Enjoy managing the traffic and becoming a master of Tiny Cars, the ultimate arcade traffic management game!

games.description: The battle of the blobs and slimes is beginning in this great eating simulator. Pick your slime character and start competing against others. Eat smaller blobs and slimes, and make yours bigger than the others. Become the king of the blob arena! Buy various blob skins during the game. On each game, receive various rewards with the blob sizes and coins. Chase smaller blobs and eat them. Collect blobs around and increase your score.
games.instructions: The game is playable in 1 or 2 players at time. Player 1: W,A,S,D Player 2: ARROW KEYS Common controls: Control the camera by holding RIGHT-CLICK on the MOUSE Control the camera zoom with MOUSE SCROLL Use Joystick controls on mobile devices/tablets.
