games.description: Grand Clash Arena is a unique war game that offers an action-packed experience. Key Features of the Game: -Epic Combat Experience: Showcase your mastery against opponents by using every object at your disposal. -Drop Weapons and Surprises: Alter the flow of the game with surprise drops from the sky. Surprise your opponents with powerful weapons that suddenly appear and gain an advantage. Grand Clash Arena offers a unique gaming experience that combines the art of war and strategy.
games.instructions: Join now, prove yourself in battles! Use WASD keys to move around the arena, spacebar to jump and right mouse button to hit.

games.description: In this physics-based innovative puzzle game, your objective is to strategically place screws and nuts to fall all the wooden blocks. Unleash your cognitive ability as you tackle each brain-teasing level, each one designed to test your problem-solving skills. From simple puzzles to complex constructions, this 2D puzzle game offers an array of challenges suitable for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button or tap on the screw, then tap to the empty holes to place the screw. Think well and find best spots of empty holes to place the screws. Be careful when placing screws as you have limited empty holes and some of which may become covered by the wood blocks you released.

games.description: Merge numbers by adding tiles with the same number to the field next to already placed tiles (vertically or horizontally). Each merge will create a new tile with a number one higher. Boosters: - Remove any tile from the field; - Remove all tiles with the selected number; - Refresh: allows to change tile form the "NEXT" up to 5 times. Each booster is available only once in a single game. Challenge yourself in this number master merge puzzle. Try to get the higher tile and beet your best score.
games.instructions: Left mouse click to interact

games.description: In this exciting game, you will take on the role of an experienced stuntman, performing daring stunts on your motorcycle at different levels. Unlock new levels and buy cool motorcycles in the Stunt Rider game.
games.instructions: Control the motorcycle, avoiding overturning, and get to the finish line. Management: Computer: Arrow keys or W, A, S, D to control the motorcycle. Additionally, Left Shift and Right Shift can be used for the gas pedal, and the Space bar can be used for the brake Mobile phone: Use the pedal buttons on the screen to control the motorcycle.

games.description: Start with a skeleton, choose your evolution route.
games.instructions: Swipe the screen to control character movement

games.description: Exotic cars, mega ramps, colorful giant bosses and face to face races all come together in this game. GT Cars Mega Ramps invites you to a fantastic driving experience with its completely unique game-play. Fly over mega ramps with your customized exotic car, destroy giant bosses or try to finish the stages first in face to face races!
games.instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "N" Restart car position: "L" Change camera view: "U"

games.description: Funny, witty, bubbling and very magical… these are the Bubiloons, some cute unicorn animals full of surprises that you will discover in this App.
games.instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

games.description: The battle between the holes is beginning in the arena! Pick your hole and join this battle! Eat fruits, planes, cars, and many things that come to mind, and grow as much as you can! Your goal is to eat things that are smaller than you and make your hole bigger than the enemy's. Avoid bigger holes and try to collect power-ups besides eatable items. Four different great maps are waiting for you: - 2048 Map - World Map - Stationary Map - Kitchen Map
games.instructions: On PC: Move: MOUSE Boost: LEFT-CLICK On Mobile Devices/Tablets: Use Joystick and Boost buttons. Eat smaller items, destroy smaller opponents, and avoid bigger enemies.

games.description: Immerse yourself in the world of samurai and ninjas in Ninja Time. Stretch your bamboo stick to navigate increasingly complex levels, collecting coins for new ninja skins. Experience Japan's martial arts era and become the ultimate ninja legend!
games.instructions: Grow your stick to reach the next platform.

games.description: Embark on a fashionable trip to the center of the Universe with your favorite princesses while playing the Insta Trends: Galaxy Fashion dress-up game for girls. Elsa, Anna, Moana, Ariel, and Rapunzel recently found Planet Her, and they are super excited to share their new home with you. Fashion on this amazing planet is galaxy colored and centered around fashionable suits and out-of-this-world accessories. Discover them all while helping the girls choose their outfits for the day! Have fun!
games.instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

games.description: Armed with a pistol in each hand, take control of the famous Stickman from the "Gun Fu" series and blast through hordes of enemies! Reflexes and reaction times will be challenged and put to the test as the never-ending onslaught gets faster and faster! Unlock more deadly guns and outfits, and customize your Stickman to suit your style!
games.instructions: Test your reflexes and fire guns in the coolest Stickmen shooting game ever!

games.description: Dive into the world of entrepreneurship by purchasing lots in the town and building a variety of businesses. This idle game allows your businesses to automatically generate profit, even while you're away. Hire managers to boost your earnings and optimize your operations. Expand your business empire by strategically investing in new properties and upgrades.
games.instructions: Build and manage businesses in an idle game where profits grow automatically, even when you're away.

games.description: Dive into Dice Merge Challenges, a game that blends strategic merging with thrilling destruction! Dice Merge Challenges offers intuitive gameplay that's easy to pick up. But as you progress, the challenges become more mind-bending! Combine dice with identical numbers to trigger an explosion creating a new dice with a higher value. Strategically merge your dice to overpower obstacles and shatter every box! Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Merge Champion?
games.instructions: Press Space, or Click on the drop button to drop a Dice.

games.description: Welcome to Two Dots Remastered, a fun and popular HTML5 connecting game enjoyed by gamers of all ages! Two Dot Remastered’s gameplay is straightforward: Match two or more dots in the same color (not diagonal ones) and then blast them! Enjoy playing Two Dots Remastered, the ultimate connecting game for gamers of all ages, and become a master at connecting dots!
games.instructions: Find two or more dots of the same color that are adjacent (horizontally or vertically). Draw a line connecting the dots to blast them and score points. Plan your moves to create longer chains for higher scores. Two Dots puzzle also has 4 in-game boosters along with in-game items like Anchor, Box, etc. Use boosters strategically to clear challenging levels.

games.description: Players can control the tank to perform various exciting missions and defeat the enemy. Players will have to synthesize a variety of weapons for tanks. There are many tanks in the game that you can choose according to your preference. While completing the task, you must avoid obstacles at any time, and also constantly resist fire from enemy tanks Each level mode has a different difficulty that you can choose from. The higher the level, the higher the stable income received.
games.instructions: Activate your tank and shoot at the enemy's concentration area, destroying the enemy's armor. Take part in many new real-time challenge modes. Complete tasks of the assigned level and unlock new tanks. As you continue to control the tank, it is necessary to use various gaming skills correctly. Mobile: Control your tank to navigate the map using a virtual joystick PC: Use WSAD to move and click the red icon to shoot

games.description: A small panda has to go through many challenges to reach his home safely form school. there will be many challenges on the way
games.instructions: PC Keybord Run - arrow key right - left / jump - arrow up key Mobile - Touch Button

games.description: Mega Ramp Car Stunts plays like a hard-core stunt car-driving simulation game. With 3D obstacles on the track, you have a chance to challenge 10 levels in the Stunt Mode and 16 levels in the Giant Ramp mode. Whether you meet checkpoints or not, you need to drive the car to the finish line safely. Don't forget to buy better vehicles in the garage when you have enough green diamonds.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Move the blocks and guide the ball to the goal. After a period of time, the ball starts to move. Connect the paths quickly so that the ball doesn't fall. Some blocks can jump and some can warp.
games.instructions: Drag to move blocks.

games.description: Epic battles, complex labyrinths with multiple paths and treacherous enemies await you in the game! You will have to pass difficult tests in the fight against an ancient evil that wants to destroy all existing worlds. Only you can prevent the destruction of the universe and save other worlds from destruction. 18 challenging levels and mazes are waiting for you. 2 or more ways to pass the level Save this world to give the rest of the universe a chance!
games.instructions: Your goal is to collect the right amount of energy to open the portal and move to the next level. Controls for PC: A - move left D - move right W – jump W+W - double jump Spacebar - punch Controls for mobile/tablet: Virtual left arrow - move left Virtual right arrow - move right Virtual jump button – jump Virtual attack button – punch

games.description: You are the owner of your market. Customers are coming to buy various products. Collect these products and place them into correct stands so that customers can buy them. Collect money from customers and open new markets and become a market boss!
games.instructions: Collect products and sell them to customers and drum up your business!

games.description: In case you are ready for a creepy adventure full of horror and exploration, then choose Horror Escape: Granny Room without hesitation! In our game, you are going to go on a dangerous journey. Collect clues and keys while trying to escape the clutches of horrible granny. Your path is full of dangers. You must dodge the monsters lurking in the dark corners. To unlock these areas, you must collect keys and reveal secrets. What awaits you? Only time will tell.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Robots Gone Wild is a thrilling survival game in a sci-fi world with captivating visuals and intense shooting mechanics. Your goal is to escape from rogue robots and destroy them while navigating through hazardous environments. To survive, keep upgrading your character and weapons. Improve your armor, and unlock powerful guns to fend off waves of increasingly powerful robots. Engage in exciting battles, and explore beautiful environments that immerse you in the chaos of a world gone wild.
games.instructions: One finger control to navigate around attacking robots. Shooting aims automatically at the closest enemy. Keep collecting blue dots and coins to upgrade your character

games.description: Dive into the world of car mechanics in this engaging hidden object game. After inheriting your grandpa's global network of garages, you take on the role of the new owner, with your Uncle Joe guiding you through the intricacies of the trade. Explore various locations, uncover hidden car parts, and learn the art of automotive repair.
games.instructions: Explore and uncover hidden car parts in this captivating car mechanic hidden object game.

games.description: Do you want to be a unique restaurant manager? You can learn how to be a manager with the Idle Restaurant game. You may need some experts for cooking and serving. Hire a master chef, develop your staff, manage your finances and become the perfect boss. Also, dont forget to check your market for surprise gifts. You can play Idle Restaurant Tycoon in a simple way without the need to constantly click.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: 10 Levels of an exciting and action-packed game that brings player to a mysterious woods and castles. The game begins with a dramatic scenario in which a vampire has stolen the princess and the brave Tiny Knight is the only one who can save her. As the princess is abducted, the Tiny Knight embarks on a quest to retrieve her by through dangerous woodlands and battle his way through the castle's maze. Along the journey, the knight must fight Orcs, Skeletons and win Dracula to save the princess!
games.instructions: Click to jump, double click to double jump

games.description: Mental Hospital Escape is an exciting hide-and-seek game. In total, it contains two modes, doctor and patient. If you choose a doctor, you need to capture all the patients within the time limit. If you are patient, you need to run as hard as you can in the time limit, climb rocks, dodge chases, and survive!
games.instructions: Mouse click and drag to move

games.description: An engaging 3D puzzle with numerous levels. Find pairs and arrange objects so that everything fits. Develop spatial thinking and solve challenges. Enjoy high-quality 3D graphics in this captivating browser puzzle game.
games.instructions: The game is controlled using the mouse or your finger (if playing on a mobile device). Press the right mouse button or use your finger to drag and drop items to their desired locations. The game offers various locations and levels, each of which may present different challenges. You'll need to sort items of the same type, find matching items, and try to fit the required quantity into a box. Hints will accompany you throughout the game to ensure you don't get stuck and always know what to do!

games.description: Colored Bricks is a fun and simple endless game. There are colorful bricks and one on the top. You should move that one to the right or left. When it hits the same color brick, it will destroy all bricks of the row. The challenge is to improve your high score in the limited time that you have! Some bricks have extra time if you destroy them.
games.instructions: In the Colored Bricks game you may swipe left or right to position the top brick. Match Colors: Align it with a brick of the same color. Earn Extra Time: Destroy special bricks to gain extra time. Aim for the highest score within the limited time!

games.description: Touch controls have never been easier and more accurate! Run, jump, and climb walls just by tapping anywhere on. Pass the obstacles and raise the flag to complete the level. Difficult levels will make you addicted and feel challenged. complete all levels and try to unlock cute and cool skins
games.instructions: tap anywhere to jump and raise the flag to complete the level

games.description: Jump Ball Classic is the best game to test your reflexes. Move your ball left and right to avoid obstacles and enjoy the thrilling moment! Once it hits, it will fail immediately. Concentrate and challenge for success!
games.instructions: Tap to jump

games.description: The most legendary quest of your life begins! Miners from all around the world have come to get their hands on these precious gems. Join them in the effort and engage in various challenges while trying to dig out as many diamonds as possible.
games.instructions: Move and match identical diamonds into chains of 3 or more. You will be rewarded with explosive power-ups if you match 4 or more.

games.description: Hi, B.B.s, welcome to the big city of L.O.L. Surprise! where you will visit the coolest shops, full of games and surprises.
games.instructions: PLAY FUN MINIGAMES Explore the shops and buildings in the big city and have fun discovering funny minigames: solve puzzles, shop for you and other B.B.s, decorate the disco, learn other languages, make music, and lots more! COMPETE WITH B.B.s Find the hidden words, test your knowledge about the L.O.L. connecting each BB with her LIL and her pet, win a game at checkers and tic-tac-toe, and try to win at other fun games.

games.description: A puzzle game for girls where the player has to collect puzzles with images of princesses and villains. The game features 50 tasks, the difficulty of which is gradually increasing. Each puzzle is unique, which contributes to the development of logical thinking, imagination and fine motor skills of the players. Let's start collecting puzzles and immerse ourselves in a world of magic and adventure with beautiful princesses and dangerous villains!
games.instructions: The game consists of 50 levels, the difficulty of which is gradually increasing. At each level, you need to assemble a puzzle with some fabulous female character. There is no time limit on the level, but at each level there is a timer. At the end of the game, you can find out the total time spent on completing the game and save this result to share with your friends. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch of the touch screens is used to control.

games.description: Assemble a wide variety of brick buildings and scenes in this classic constructor game. Start as a baby builder and level your way up to increasingly complex construction sets. This relaxing and satisfying game is sure to bring you back to the imagination and fun of your childhood! Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. Get hands-on fun without the clutter or accidentally stepping on toys.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: No obstacles, no matter how high, can stop me from collecting more goods. Pass the obstacles and finally collect enough goods. Now, your supermarket can open
games.instructions: Swipe the screen to control character movement

games.description: Classic Labyrinth 3d - The wooden maze funny game with the steel ball everyone knows comes to your browser! Enjoy this classic marble maze labyrinth. Features: - Accurate ball physic simulation - Joystick Controler - Smooth ball movement - Personal highscores - 3 Star rating system - One coin per 3 Star finished level - Realistic sounds - Coins to continue, if you fail during the level.
games.instructions: Use mouse or arrow / wasd keys to move the steelball to the target. Avoid the holes and obstacles. Collect coins by finishing the level as fast as possible. Use the coins to continue after you fell into a hole.

games.description: Your favorite influencers are back, and this time, they are getting ready to have fun and dress up in urban fashion! Experiment with different styles, play with colors and don't forget to use cool accessories for stunning urban looks.
games.instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

games.description: Stack Strategic bridges for your monster army to cross and defeat the monster enemies. Construct bridges wide enough to guide your army of monster characters to cross safely and face off against formidable foes. With simple yet addictive gameplay, immerse yourself in a world of tactical challenges where every move counts. Can you lead your army to victory and claim dominance over your enemies? Play Bridge Fight! now and let the fun begin!
games.instructions: Tap to stack the bricks and build the bridge. Drag around to move and avoid the Boss enemy

games.description: Welcome to Sky Block Bounce, the ultimate test of agility and strategy in a sky-high adventure! Your mission is simple yet exhilarating: jump on the blocks and navigate your way to the teleporter. But beware, each block behaves differently—some will vanish after just one jump, while others can withstand two or more.
games.instructions: Use Arrow keys or WASD to move.

games.description: Do you like riding a mountain bike? Biking Extreme 3D offers you a chance to ride a mountain bike and challenge multiplayer mountain racing tracks. It doesn't matter when you crash any other riders on the track, they will be crashed into the sky. But please always keep a safe distance between your vehicle and obstacles like trees and rocks. Or else, you will lose the game directly. The coins you won are used to upgrade your bike. Don't forget to try another 5 characters!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Grow your industrial powerhouse: become a heavy machine titan of industry! Manufacture cars, trucks, planes, military vehicles, and high-tech instruments for space exploration! Watch your factory grow from a single production line to a world-famous industrial powerhouse. Experience endless fun in this beautiful Match 3 game!

games.description: Build-A-Flop: The Sickman Playground is not just a game—it's a people's playground of laughter and creativity! With its whimsical world and endless opportunities for hilarity, it's sure to become a favorite among players of all ages.
games.instructions: mouse , arrow key

games.description: Are you ready to go on an exciting adventure in the heart of nature with Duck Hunting: Open Season? In this addictive matching game, your goal is to pass challenging levels by collecting bullets and shooting ducks.Make items of the same type explode by combining them in groups of three or more. Your goal is to collect bullets and hunt ducks. Also use various power-ups such as Explosives, rockets and special hammers to create bigger explosions and go faster. Have Fun!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In this sliding-puzzle game you will have to make your way by painting the walls. Along the way you'll encounter spikes, portals, and collapsing walls.
games.instructions: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move / Touch-screen buttons R - Restart Esc - Menu

games.description: Welcome to Bubble Blitz Galaxy! Aim and shoot bubbles towards similar ones to collect them while ensuring they stay away from the borderline. Experience two exciting modes: In Arcade Mode, strive to survive as long as possible and score as much as you can. In Challenge Mode, survive and achieve target scores, facing new challenges one after another. Get ready for an exhilarating bubble-blasting adventure!
games.instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to aim and shoot bubbles towards similiar ones to collect them while ensuring they stay away from the borderline.

games.description: Do you love Finger Heart posing? Do you want to make Finger Heart with a cute character? Let's Play This Game. In Finger Heart: Monster Refill, you must choose how to fit your finger with other adorable monsters to form a perfect heart. To fill a perfect heart, you don’t need any special skills, just use your imagination and creativity. They can change its shape in many ways. You'll need to think carefully about which form fits the shape of your fingers. Come make hearts with cute monsters!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Are you ready for adventure with the Nugget man character? To save the Nugget Man character who is stranded in the desert, you must fly into the sky without bursting the balloons. You must be careful to take the character to the finish by solving the puzzles before time runs out, accompanied by Gedagedago music. Rescue Nugget Man through desert bandits, cacti and many other challenging obstacles! Enjoy.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: You can move animals from side to side. You have to collect full horizontal lines to make them disappear. Some animals are frozen and must be released twice, some are locked in cages and cannot be moved. Use bonuses when necessary
games.instructions: Slide Pet blocks and create full lines. Move Pet blocks to empty positions and create full lines to remove lines.

games.description: Fall for fun in this addictive hypercasual game! Ready for a wild ride? Join the thief as he falls from dizzying heights, dodging obstacles and collecting coins in this addictive hypercasual game. With two distinct locations to explore and endless possibilities for high scores, the fun never ends in this exciting game.
games.instructions: With simple one-tap controls and fast-paced gameplay, you'll be hooked from the start. Keep an eye out for power-ups like gravity boosts and magnets, and unlock new skins with the coins you collect.

games.description: Blastify II is a new addictive tap-to-blast puzzle game. Easy to pick up and play, this game offers a delightful experience for all ages. With endless entertainment and a steady stream of new puzzles, you can enjoy playing for hours on end.
games.instructions: In this puzzle game, you should destroy the group of the same colored blocks in the puzzle board by tapping on them. You should collect the remaining blocks until you hit the target. Utilize four unique boosters to blast through obstacles and reach new heights.

games.description: ? Welcome to "Just Dice: Random Tower Defense"! Get ready to roll the dice and defend your territory against hordes of relentless monsters in this exciting tower defense game. With a unique merging mechanic and vibrant visuals, you'll be hooked from the very first roll!
games.instructions: ? In "Just Dice: Random Tower Defense," you'll strategically place dice-shaped towers on the map to fend off waves of monsters. Each tower resembles a dice, with different numbers of dots indicating its power level. ? To strengthen your defenses, merge two dice towers of identical dot counts to create a higher-level tower with increased firepower. Choose your merges wisely to build the most powerful defense against the relentless monster onslaught.

games.description: You take control of two characters in Stickman Leave jail, a new entry in the stickman jail series. Your goal is to guide them to the level's finish as they search for the corresponding colored keys to unlock the door. The objective is to evade capture by the guards. Collect money spread over the level to unlock new, more skilled skins. As you go around the game, leap and avoid harmful things to arrive safely.
games.instructions: Find the key to change characters so you can move and get to the exits on time; the goal is to get all the stick figures to the door. Every single stickman jail game is available right now on Kiz10 for free online play. A walkthrough: To move and leap, use WASD. Click and hold on the screen to navigate and leap.

games.description: The aim of the Bus Collect game is to collect the passengers waiting on the road by making the right directions and deliver them to the finish point. To do this, direct the roads the vehicle will follow with arrow signs. Try to reach high scores by carrying as many passengers as possible to the finish point.
games.instructions: Use MOUSE to turn arrow signs and steer the car.

games.description: Pin master: Screw puzzle quest & brain games challenges your problem-solving skills in a captivating pin puzzle adventure. Strategically tap to unlock screw holes on products, guiding metal plates to fall in the correct sequence. Navigate through intricate mazes of nuts, bolts, and plates. With each level presenting new challenges, immerse yourself in over 100 brain-teasing stages. Need a hint? No problem! Utilize the hint feature or remove random screws to progress.
games.instructions: Tap to unlock the screw holes on the product to make the metal plate fall. Think carefully before making a decision. Keep on thinking and trying until you hit on the solution. Click button whenever you need hints or remove random screws

games.description: Hair Stack 3D is a hair running game. Go through the numbered doors and collect more hair. Dodge the obstacles that make you less in number. Your ultimate goal is to make more hair so that the bald head at the end can have beautiful hair! Are you ready to help him? Let him applaud you!
games.instructions: Slide to move

games.description: Try a fresh take on a football game! The luck-based gameplay will keep you on your toes. Score extra points with precise shots that avoid the goalkeeper perfectly.
games.instructions: Spin the football slot machine for progress in the duel and score extra points in a goal-shooting minigame. Advance through the leagues and gather trophies.

games.description: Sky Balls 3D invites you on an adventure as you travel through the sky with rolling balls and test your reaction skills. Keep the ball on the track without letting it fall and watch out for obstacles, traps and gaps! Collect coins and keys along the way to get new ball skins and sky-boxes. You can play the game in 1 player and 2 player modes.
games.instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D," or "ARROW KEYS" or "MOUSE" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS"

games.description: Dive into an enchanting underwater world with "Mermaids: Spot The Differences"! Explore vibrant ocean scenes teeming with mermaids and sea creatures as you sharpen your observation skills to uncover subtle distinctions. Immerse yourself in the magic of the deep blue and embark on an adventure of keen-eyed discovery!
games.instructions: Click or tap to reveal differences in vibrant underwater scenes starring mermaids and sea life! Sharpen your observation skills and plunge into the oceanic adventure!

games.description: Play card games, relax and train your memory and brain with CityMix Solitaire. Solitaire CityMix is more than just another game♠♥♠♥! Which would you prefer: decorating and restoring a quiet town, or solving puzzles and seeking adventure on a lost island? With CityMix Solitaire you can decorate, solve puzzles and mysteries, follow adventures and help brave heroes. Vicky and her pet Raccoon will help in this challenging quest.
games.instructions: Collect cards in the correct order. Complete game tasks. Help the residents of this cozy town and find out their history!

games.description: Merge Numbers is a relaxing HTML5 game to play, the objective of the game is to combine two same tile or number into one, then tile number will be upgraded and score will be increased. The game will ended if there is no room or movement available in the board.
games.instructions: Touch or mouse = Swipe game screen (up, down, left or right) to move tiles Keyboard = Press W,A,S,D to move tiles

games.description: Destination Brain Test is a great puzzle game to text your brain. You only need to drag to launch the ball to destroy all the blocks with various shapes. The farther you go, the more difficult levels you will meet. Luckily, you can try countless times in this game. So, try to challenge it now!
games.instructions: Drag to launch

games.description: It's a unique experimental puzzle game, where all you are given is the title of your current puzzle. If you get the hint, you know what to do, how to arrange the blocks and solve the riddle.
games.instructions: You see the title of your current puzzle. If you get the hint, you know what to do, how to arrange the blocks and solve the riddle. If not you can use extra clues. At the end of the game the total number of the clues you used to complete all 30 riddles becomes your anti score. And, as it was stated, this is the game you can finish only once, so this number of hints you needed becomes your permanent forever result. This puzzle game is all about riddles, hints and your wits.

games.description: What are you going to do when you go on a journey to a tropical island? Will you spend your time in a lounger, enjoying the hot sun and cold drinks, or become a master surfer? Our heroine Emily has arrived at this heavenly place to make her honorable grandfather Douglas Kirby’s dream to build a hotel of his own come true.
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

games.description: Introducing "Kitchen Star," the ultimate puzzle challenge for visual thinkers! In this captivating game, players are tasked with unraveling intricate images by strategically rotating connected chunks of lines. Your mission? Reveal the full image in as few turns as possible by rotating different sections. With each twist and turn, the true picture emerges, but can you decode it before you're all twisted up? Get ready to sharpen your spatial skills and become the ultimate Kitchen Star!
games.instructions: In each level, an image has been scrambled. Rotate the pieces by pressing the rotation buttons until the image is right again. The fewer moves you use, the better your score!

games.description: Grow your hotel empire in this idle tycoon simulation game. Construct different hotel floors to suit the needs of your customers. This includes construcing standard hotel rooms, cafe bistros, deluxe rooms, meeting rooms for corporate customers, vip rooms, infinity pools, gym and fitness rooms and of course, the bougee presidential suite. Control hotel employees, move them up and down the elevators to move the cash, and finally CASH it in the reception office.
games.instructions: Build and grow your hotel business

games.description: Welcome to the fascinating world of natural elements and magic! The main characters of the game are already waiting for you - five beautiful girls representing various elements: fire, water, earth and air. The makeup and outfit of each of these girls is inspired by the element that she represents. The fifth heroine is special. This girl is an Avatar that combines all four elements!
games.instructions: In this game you will get to know the beautiful representatives of the natural elements, who need your help in creating makeup and attire that personifies their element. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screen is used to control it.

games.description: Fast-paced and Exciting free-run Snake PvP Gameplay. Play as a snake and collect points to grow longer. Avoid the deadly tiles or use the snake body to break the tiles in your way! But watch out, because the snake will shorten as you use points. Quick decisions are key! Compete with a different opponent in each battle. Grow your snakes, avoid Skull Tiles and collect Battle Points to climb the daily leaderboard and be the One to claim the Snake Clash Crown. Game on!
games.instructions: Keep growing your snake and destroy as many tiles as possible during 2 minutes to collect the most points. Avoid dangerous tiles. One finger control of the snake: swipe left and right to navigate
